# Terms and Descriptions by Chapter

## Chapter 1 Introduction to Loss Data Analytics

```{r}
library(pander)
chapter1 <- read.csv("~/R project/LDAGlossary/csv/Chapter1.csv", header=TRUE,
                       na.strings=c("."), stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
table1.1 <- cbind(chapter1[, 1], chapter1[, 2])
final.table1.1 <- as.data.frame(table1.1)
names(final.table1.1) <- c("Term", "Description")
pander(final.table1.1)
```
